name: T1216 - Signed Script Proxy Execution
author: n0dec
description: Adversaries may use scripts signed with trusted certificates to proxy execution of malicious files. Several Microsoft signed scripts that are default on Windows installations can be used to proxy execution of other files.

syncappvpublishingserver.description: SyncAppvPublishingServer Signed Script PowerShell Command Execution.

payload.Description: Microsoft Â® Windows Based Script Host

syncappvpublishingserver_ps.description: SyncAppvPublishingServer Signed Script PowerShell Command Execution.

payload.CommandLine: "C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" -NonInteractive -WindowStyle Hidden -ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned -Command &{$env:psmodulepath = [IO.Directory]::GetCurrentDirectory(); import-module AppvClient; Sync-AppvPublishingServer  \n;Start-Process calc}
